com.uwsoft.editor.renderer.resources

Class ResourceManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.uwsoft.editor.renderer.resources.ResourceManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAssetLoader, IDataLoader, IResourceLoader, IResourceRetriever

    public class ResourceManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements IResourceLoader, IResourceRetriever
    Default ResourceManager that you can reuse or extend Generally is good to load all the assets that are exported from editor using default settings (The paths and file structure should be exact) If changed by you manually, please override this class methods in order to keep it working. The main logic is to prepare list of resources that needs to be load for specified scenes, and then loaded. Created by azakhary on 9/9/2014.

      • setWorkingResolution

        public void setWorkingResolution(java.lang.String resolution)
        Sets working resolution, please set before doing any loading
        Parameters:
        resolution - String resolution name, default is "orig" later use resolution names created in editor

      • unLoadScene

        public void unLoadScene(java.lang.String sceneName)

        Parameters:

      • scheduleScene

        public void scheduleScene(java.lang.String name)
        Schedules scene for later loading if later prepareAssetsToLoad function will be called it will only prepare assets that are used in scheduled scene
        Parameters:
        name - - scene file name without ".dt" extension
